question:
The 100th warship was commissioned into the Navy. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The LCU L-56 will be operating from the Andaman and Nicobar islands.
  2. It is primarily tasked with transport and deployment.
  3. It is an indigenously designed and constructed warship.
Which of the above statements are correct? Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The landing craft utility L-56 vessel will be operating from the Andaman and Nicobar islands in the Bay of Bengal. The vessel will be based and administered in Port Blair of the Andaman Nicobar Command. It this region, it will carry out coastal patrolling, surveillance, search and rescue missions etc. Statement 2 is correct: The primary role of the vessel is transportation and deployment of troops, armoured vehicles, battle tanks, weapons and equipment from ship to shore. It is capable of carrying 150 troops apart from 4 officers and 56 sailors. It is an amphibious vessel and can carry out multiple roles like beaching operation, disaster relief, etc. Statement 3 is correct: The LCU L-56 is an indigenously designed vessel, constructed by GRSE/ Garden Reach Shipbuilders and Engineers. It was in line with the “Make in India” initiative. The inauguration ceremony was hosted at the naval base in Vizag.
